nodes.html:
Welcome to Appvity's Teams News Roundup for August 2021!

MS Teams News.

  • What’s New in Microsoft Teams | July 2021. Microsoft Teams Blog.
  • Hands on with Microsoft Teams integration in Windows 11. Mayank Parmar.
  • Microsoft Teams hits 250 million monthly active user milestone. Mary Jo Foley, ZDNet.
  • Best Microsoft Teams Features: 56 We Use in 2021. Dominic Kent.
Note: Microsoft Teams will not support Internet Explorer 11 starting November 30, 2020. Learn more.

Teams Feedback.

These are the top ideas in the Teams User Voice forum.
  • Reply to specific message in chat on desktop app. Having the ability to reply to specific messages in a chat on the desktop app. This is available on mobile today. [In Testing].
  • I want to use multiple Teams accounts at the same time. [WORKING ON IT].
  • Include Office 365 group calendar in teams. [WORKING ON IT].
These features are "In Testing" phase and might be available soon in Teams.
  • URL shortener for Teams. When using the "get link" option in teams it would be better to have an embedded link shortener.
  • Adaptive Cards + Webhooks. We are happy to announce that we now have support for posting Adaptive Cards via Incoming Webhooks in developer preview!

Books & Trainings

  • End-user training for Microsoft Teams. Microsoft host a series of free, live, online training classes designed to get you up and running with Teams.
  • Admin training for Microsoft Teams. Microsoft provides the training resources to educate admins about Teams, teach others or run workshops.
Cover Title
Hands-On Microsoft Teams: A practical guide to enhancing enterprise collaboration with Microsoft Teams and Office 365
By Joao Ferreira.



$16
Microsoft Teams For Dummies
By Rosemarie Withee.		 $12
Hands-On Microsoft Teams: A practical guide to enhancing enterprise collaboration with Microsoft Teams and Office 365
By Joao Ferreira.		 $1

Sao anh không về chơi thôn Vĩ?
Nhìn nắng hàng cau nắng mới lên.
Vườn ai mướt quá xanh như ngọc,
Lá trúc che ngang mặt chữ điền.

Gió theo lối gió, mây đường mây,
Dòng nước buồn thiu, hoa bắp lay...
Thuyền ai đậu bến sông trăng đó,
Có chở trăng về kịp tối nay?

Mơ khách đường xa, khách đường xa
Áo em trắng quá nhìn không ra...
Ở đây sương khói mờ nhân ảnh
Ai biết tình ai có đậm đà?

Subject: This article describes how to use Excel plugin to work with eTask. eTask provides comprehensive support for different devices such as web browser, mobile, voices, and Teams. eTask can also be managed from different applications in the Microsoft's stack such as PowerApp, PowerShell, and Office. Subject: This article gives a preview of eHelpdesk. eHelpdesk is the next major cloud productivity application from Appvity to be released in early 2022. eHelpdesk provides Support Management that was deeply integrated into Microsoft's Teams environment. Subject: This article describes how tasks and issues from DevOps can be integrated into eTask. One of the highly regarded features of eTask is the ability to integrate data from external system such as JIRA and DevOps. This integration provides users with the ability to manage tasks from multiple angles. This article descibes how such an integration can be accomplished.

Subject: This article describes how user mappings are accomplished between eTask and external datasources. One of the highly regarded features of eTask is the ability to integrate data from external system such as JIRA and DevOps. This integration provides users with the ability to manage tasks from multiple angles. This article descibes how users from external system are handled in eTask.

eTask external data sources
